meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the May 24, 2024, Housing & Homelessness Solutions Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Department of Housing and Neighborhood Revitalization FY 2024-25 Budget Review and Next Steps
agenda_items.description: Review of the budget and next steps for the Department of Housing and Neighborhood Revitalization.

agenda_items.title: Homeless Response System Quarterly Report
agenda_items.description: Quarterly report on the homeless response system.

agenda_items.title: Homeless Engagement Initiatives at Dallas Public Library
agenda_items.description: Discussion on initiatives for engaging the homeless at the Dallas Public Library.

agenda_items.title: Consideration and Approval of the Sale of two (2) Land Transfer Program Lots
agenda_items.description: Approval for the sale of land transfer program lots to Cornerstone Community Development Corporation.

agenda_items.title: Office of Homeless Solutions and the Department of Housing and Neighborhood Revitalization Properties Update
agenda_items.description: Update on various properties related to homeless solutions.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Housing Needs Assessment and Target Area Action Plans
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the housing needs assessment and action plans.

agenda_items.title: Housing and Homelessness Committee Solutions Proposed 2025 Legislative Priorities
agenda_items.description: Discussion on proposed legislative priorities for 2025.

agenda_items.title: Authorize a contract with Wright Choice Group, LLC
agenda_items.description: Authorization for a contract for consultant services related to housing instability.

agenda_items.title: Authorize the amendment of Resolution No. 23-0543
agenda_items.description: Amendment of a resolution regarding funding and agreements for homeless assistance.
